data.title: Ignore damage from friendlies that is <= 0
data.body:
Check to make sure Attacker is not null.
Ignores self-attacking.
Ignores friendly-fire that does <= 0 damage (repairs).

Fixes https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/3963

data.title: C&C aircraft polish.
data.body:
![polish](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/167819/1444842/ccab4f86-4212-11e3-9da8-aec52783730f.png)

Improves and rebalances the Airstrike support power, and adds contrails to A10 and C17.

data.title: Main Menu Proposal
data.body:
It's been discussed on IRC (and in issues) that OpenRA could feature a skirmish, a co-op mode and campaign menu.

Here are two mockup images showing a new Main Menu that would feature these suggestions/modes. As you can see, I have created sub-menus for the Campaign and Multiplayer modes.

Main Menu -- Campaign:
https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/1732773/1440881/5dae3474-41a2-11e3-82c8-f8a0146413b8.png

Main Menu -- Multiplayer:
https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/1732773/1440933/35979484-41a3-11e3-862f-2e390c68545b.png

The goal of these mockups is also to declutter the Main menu from all its buttons.

data.title: Use the original Dune 2000 shroud
data.body: @mvi e-Mailed me some private source code (thanks) I can harvest the shroud rendering from. We currently use a 24x24 → 32x32 rescaled version of the RA shroud sprites for d2k which is ugly.

data.title: Disable team/global chat switch in 1vs1s or 1vs2s...
data.body:
From IRC logs (2013-10-27):

[10:17:24]  xanax--> pchote, Scott` : don't you think the TEAM/GLOBAL chat switch should be disabled during a 1v1 game ? I think the Team chat is useless in 1v1s.

[10:17:38]  pchote--> xanax: yes

[10:23:52]  Mailaender--> it is also useless in a 1vs2 for the lone ranger, so better disable it when no one else is in the same team.

data.title: Attacking a map object with a dog can crash the game
data.body:
If you attack a map object with a dog, the game can crash.

Please fix this crash. You can test it on the KID map currently; attack the "tank trap" object with a dog.

And don't tell me this is map-specific problem; a crash is never map makers fault. Game should never crash, even if someone made crappy maps!

data.title: Add a SDL2-GL renderer.
data.body: Packaging changes (including removing the OSX launcher binary blob) will be handled in a later patch series.

data.title: Turreted Actor now rotates to random facing on idle
data.body:
```
+ bool IdleSweep
+ int SweepDelay
```

data.title: Load C&C and D2K dlls in the RA mod.
data.body:
Norman and @Kaito-Kid have both ran into problems in their RA mod-maps caused by C&C-defined traits being unavailable to RA.

A longer-term fix would be to split the mod-level code based on type (system traits / unit traits / widgets / missions / etc) instead of the default mod that they are used by.

data.title: Tilesets are not logically ordered
data.body:
Currently there are four tilesets:
- temperat
- desert
- snow
- interior
- (Maybe there would be a possibility to add own tilesets in maps?)

But only the desert-tileset is a folder in …/mods/ra/bits/ the others are .mix-files
Would be better if it's consistently one form.
(Maybe as a folder - it's better for Map-Designers)

data.title: Allow maps to define their own cursor sequences
data.body:
Maybe the OpenRA-Team can implement self-made cursors.

For example:
 For selmade mini-missiles want to implement another cursors in the game.
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/1050188-allow-maps-to-define-their-own-cursor-sequences?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: More options for "SupportPowers"
data.body:
It would be nice if

1) You can select the cursor in the SupportPowers
For example: I made mini-missiles and wand to change the nuke-cursor

2) You can remove SupportPowers from rules
For example: This doesn't work:

AFLD:
    -ParatroopersPower:

3) You can use the SupportPowers from other mods
For example: The IonCannonPower from CC

------------------------------------------ NEW ------------------------------------------
4) And maybe a hotkey:option for SupportPowers would be great

5) Also a good idea is an option to define the time what a Nuke-Missle needs for coming up and down

6) The GPS-Satellite takes alwas the sputnik.shp. Would be nice if you can define what shp-file it takes.

data.title: First "make-sequence" doesn't appear
data.body:
The "make"-animation of buildings does not show the first .shp-sequence. It starts with the second sequence.
for example:

```
fix:
    make: fixmake
        Start: 0
        Length: *
        Tick: 1500
```

data.title: Cg binaries missing for Windows and Mac
data.body:
Needs instructions in the crash dialog what to do with:
- http://developer.download.nvidia.com/cg/Cg_2.2/Cg-2.2_October2009.dmg
- http://developer.download.nvidia.com/cg/Cg_2.2/Cg-2.2_October2009_Setup.exe

data.title: Map changes
data.body: For some reason any maps compressed with `zip` or the OSX compression utility crash SharpZipLib, so they are committed as raw folders.

data.title: Move Zombie up in the RA infantry tab build palette order
data.body: It's in the middle of the build palette right now

data.title: Renamed Capture traits to ExternalCapture & LegacyCapture traits to Capture
data.body:
Just a rename, no logic changes have taken place. As a result the overall diff is a mess, but this is easily readable if you look at the individual commits:

Capture -> ExternalCapture ( c1e5be3 )
LegacyCapture -> Capture ( 2229bbf )

data.title: New FreeSans.ttf font
data.body:
I have tried to update the FreeSans.ttf font with new glyphs:
- the OpenRA logo
- a comic bubble (for Scott's IRC feature, in order to switch from the "waiting room" to the global chatroom). http://hpics.li/8360a01
- OSX keys 

The generated font: ~~https://www.dropbox.com/s/840rrkrv2avg8v4/newFreeSans.ttf~~
The FontForge file: ~~https://www.dropbox.com/s/972rsz2nmbpjwq7/newFreeSans.sfd~~

Preview:
![capture](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/1732773/1416496/c833ff7c-3f54-11e3-832b-6760a2e309d2.png)

PS : there are still errors in the font when you generate the TTF.

data.title: Use proper tile ID for RA anthills
data.body:
This lets us import original maps that have used the RA anthills. 

If we ship any maps with anthills at this time, I suspect this would break those maps?

Fixes #3865

data.title: Avoid expensive path-finding when the transport already sailed away
data.body:
This aborts earlier on `EnterTransport` orders. I especially tried to avoid `MoveAdjacentTo` that will trigger `PathSearch` and `PathFinder` and are worse-case scenarios for impossible paths that happen regularly when trying to board ground units into water transport. I was assured in my guess when I found a forseeing TODO comment warning that this can happen and has to be avoided.

I believe this will drastically improve performance on @wuschel's giant island oil derrick capture maps where you are constantly micro-managing transporters and you tend to forget more and more soldiers that will try to path through the whole (giant) map and this stacks up while you are amassing your armies.

data.title: Fixed veterancy icons drawn below actor SHP
Blinking ready box when all slots are taken
data.body: to remind people to ready up.

data.title: C&C weapon polish
Allow engineers to repair buildings (C&C)
data.body: Also fixes ownership of the biolab in EvW3.

data.title: You can't build off ally conyard in 20131026-2
Installer: add a Windows firewall exception
data.body:
The "Windows playtest installer" works fine now but what about adding a Windows firewall exception ?

The Windows firewall warning isn't really annoying but such an option could be interesting...

Edit: Mailaender found this project:
http://nsis.sourceforge.net/NSIS_Simple_Firewall_Plugin
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/1046230-installer-add-a-windows-firewall-exception?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: Additional polishing for UI buttons
data.body: as suggested in #4002.

data.title: Shake the screen when a building explodes
data.body:
I noticed that the MAD tank (#4005) makes the screen shake when buildings explode.

This is a really cool effect and I think it should happen each time any building explodes. That would really add "life" to the gameplay.

data.title: cleaned up the DEB packaging script
data.body: fixes `rm: cannot remove 'temp': No such file or directory` seen in packaging/linux/package.log

data.title: Improved R8 support.
data.body:
- Fixes #3728.
- Allows custom palettes to be loaded.
- Adds subtractive blending (for move-flash and possibly shroud).
